XRoam

The all-in-one LBVR solution for multi-user free-roaming VR experiences

Univrse

Unity Developer & Tech Lead

About XRoam

XRoam is the all-in-one Location-Based VR (LBVR) solution for creating, deploying, and managing multi-user and free-roaming VR experiences in physical spaces of all shapes and sizes.

The platform enables entertainment venues, cultural institutions, and experience centers to deliver cutting-edge immersive experiences with seamless setup and management tools. From museums to theme parks, XRoam provides the infrastructure needed to create unforgettable shared virtual experiences in the real world.

My Contributions

As Unity Tech Lead at XRoam, I worked with an amazing team to build and scale the platform from early development through soft launch to production and live ops.

Core Platform Development

Participated in the development of core systems for free-roaming VR, including spatial tracking, security, player synchronization, and mixing together different technologies like VR&AR.

Multiplayer Networking

Implemented robust multiplayer networking solutions for synchronized multi-user experiences with low latency for 60+ simultaneous users.

Technical Leadership

Led technical initiatives, designed and hosted technical workshops, established coding standards, and mentored developers on VR best practices.

Tool Development

Created content creation and deployment tools to streamline experience development for venues and partners.
